name: Storm Area 51 (gone wrong)
description:
save the aliens!

a #strategy #sandbox game where you place your troops to attack area 51. but it wont be easy... they are prepared

they got turrets, mines, lasers, barbed wire and more coming in updates ;)

controls

  • WASD or ArrowKeys - move
  • LeftShift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • Q and E - Switch Troops
  • 1, 2, 3... 9 - change skin
  • 0 - default skin
  • LeftClick- Place Troop
  • RightClick - Remove Troop
  • F - Start Storming
